title: pc-setup Catalog
description: Schema for catalog.json — defines apps and registry tweaks to apply during PC setup.

version.description: Schema version of this catalog file.

defaults.description: Default values applied to all items unless overridden.

priority.description: Fallback execution priority when an item does not specify one. Lower values run first.

items.description: Ordered list of catalog items (apps and tweaks).

type.description: Item type — 'app' installs via winget; 'tweak' writes to the registry.

category.description: Display category used for grouping in the TUI checklist.

displayName.description: Human-readable label shown in the checklist and reports.

priority.description: Execution order — lower values run first. Inherits from defaults.priority when omitted.

requiresReboot.description: When true, the user is advised to reboot after this step completes.

wingetConfig.description: Winget install configuration for an app item.

scope.description: 'machine' installs for all users; 'user' installs for the current user only.

override.description: Optional raw argument string passed verbatim to winget via --override.

tweakConfig.description: Registry tweak configuration for a tweak item.

kind.description: Tweak kind. Currently only 'registry' is supported.

actions.description: One or more registry write operations to perform.

restartExplorer.description: When true, Explorer is restarted after all actions in this tweak complete.

registryAction.description: A single registry key/value write operation.

value.description: Value to write. Use an integer for DWord/QWord, a string for String/ExpandString, an array of strings for MultiString.
